resources.string: We ensure your health and wellness
Provides you the ultimate resource for tips ,health info and support
A nutritious diet in the first month provides essential nutrients for early embryonic growth and supports the development of the baby organs and tissues.
Exercise during this early stage can help maintain overall fitness, promote healthy blood circulation, and support your physical and mental well-being. It also eases the constipation.
Walking is a low-impact exercise that can be done throughout pregnancy. It helps improve cardiovascular health, maintain muscle tone.
Swimming provides a low-impact, full-body workout. The water supports your body, relieving pressure on your joints, and helps you stay cool.
Any comfortable position is suitable during the first month. You can sleep on your back, stomach, or side, depending on your preference
Consuming foods high in folate during the second month helps prevent neural tube defects and supports the healthy development of the baby\'s brain and spinal cord.
Engaging in appropriate exercises during pregnancy can help prepare the body for labor and childbirth, improving stamina and muscle tone.
Stationary bicycling is a calorie-burning exercise that helps burn excess calories, which may aid in maintaining a healthy weight or managing weight gain.
Pelvic floor exercises help strengthen the muscles, which can improve their ability to support the pelvic organs and reduce the risk of issues such as urinary incontinence
You can still sleep on your back, but it is a good time to start transitioning to side sleeping.
Including probiotic-rich foods during the third month promotes a healthy gut microbiome, benefiting both the mothers digestive health and the baby immune system.
Engaging in low-impact exercises can help reduce joint strain and swelling, and improve circulation to the placenta, delivering more oxygen and nutrients to the baby..
Kegel exercises specifically target the pelvic floor muscles, which can undergo stress and strain during pregnancy and childbirth
It is a low-impact cardiovascular exercise. It increases your heart rate, promoting blood circulation and oxygen supply throughout your body
Sleeping on your left side is recommended. This position improves blood circulation to the baby and prevents pressure on major blood vessels
Diaphragmatic breathing helps to activate the relaxation response, reduce stress, and increase oxygen supply to your body and the baby
Continue sleeping on your left side, which allows for optimal blood flow and nutrient delivery to the placenta.
A well-balanced diet in the fourth month aids in the production of breast milk, ensuring a good supply of nutrients for the newborn after birth.
Zinc-rich foods consumed during the fifth month support the baby\'s cell growth and immune system development, promoting overall health and well-being.
Exercise can improve body awareness and promote better posture and alignment as the body undergoes changes during pregnancy.
Sleep on your left side and use a pillow between your knees for added comfort and to alleviate pressure on your hips.
Size: Size of a small pineapple
Foods rich in antioxidants, such as berries and colorful Vegetables, provide protection against oxidative stress, supporting the mother\'s health and the baby\'s growth during the sixth month.
Regular exercise can help promote healthy weight management during pregnancy and reduce the risk of excessive weight gain and can help reduce the risk of gestational diabetes and preeclampsia.
Prenatal Pilates exercises help improve posture, strengthen the abdominal and pelvic floor muscles, and promote body awareness.
Continue sleeping on your left side with a pillow supporting your knees and possibly another pillow under your abdomen for additional support.
Get rid of high heels-look for comfortable footwear
Size: Size of a small cabbage
Healthy fats from sources like avocados and nuts, consumed during the seventh month, contribute to the baby\'s brain and nervous system development
Exercise can enhance cardiovascular fitness, allowing pregnant women to better adapt to the increased demands on the heart and lungs.
Maintain the left side sleeping position and use pillows to support your belly, back, and legs, ensuring maximum comfort
A balanced diet rich in nutrients during the eighth month supports the production of neurotransmitters, which play a role in the mother\'s positive mood and mental well-being

Regular exercise during pregnancy can help maintain or improve muscle tone, strength, and flexibility. Exercise has been shown to improve mood and reduce symptoms of anxiety and depression, promoting mental well-being during pregnancy.
Continue sleeping on your left side and use multiple pillows strategically placed to provide support and alleviate discomfort
Avoid lifting or moving heavy objects
Foods high in vitamin C consumed during the ninth month help strengthen the mother\'s immune system, providing protection against common illnesses and supporting a healthy pregnancy.
Exercises that focus on balance and stability help reduce the risk of falls and promote better coordination during pregnancy.
It is a yogic breathing technique that involves equalizing the length of inhalation and exhalation. It creates a state of balance and calmness in the mind and body
Sleeping on your left side remains recommended for optimal blood flow and to relieve pressure on the uterus.
Prepare a hospital bag with essentials for both you and your baby
you will receive mail regarding your registration , after recieving mail click on login button to log into your account
